overview: Every morning, James watches his father head to work in the wintry oil fields of North Dakota. But even with no school to attend and a days worth of mischief ahead of him, this rambunctious 12-year-old doesnt think too highly of his local community or the booming business that sustains it. Solitary Plains is a visually stunning childs-eye portrait of Americas next economic frontier.
title: Solitary Plains
